Replace.Text: +1 Military policy slot. Occupying unit receives +4 [ICON_Strength] Defense Strength and 2 turns of fortification. Must be built on Hills adjacent to Encampment district.

+20% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and 10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in all cities. these yields are doubled for cities that own 5 Snow tiles within 3 tiles. Must be built on Snow adjacent to Campus district.
+1 [ICON_Citizen] Population in all current cities when completed. +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing in all cities. Must be built adjacent to Aqueduct district.
+2 [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys when you build a wonder in this city, including this wonder. Must be built adjacent to [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
+1 Economic policy slot. +50% [ICON_Gold] Gold on current treasury. Must be built adjacent to River and Commercial Hub district with Bank building.

+100% [ICON_POWER] Power for all renewable sources. These sources provide [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism equal to their [ICON_POWER] Power output. +1 Appeal to tiles adjacent to Rainforest and Marsh in your empire. Must be built adjacent to Neighborhood district.
Grants 1 free [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, and awards 2 random civics when completed. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Theater Square district.
+20% [ICON_Culture] Culture in this city, and triggers the Inspiration moment for 1 random civic from the Atomic era. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Theater Square district.

Awards 3 [ICON_Governor] Governor titles. All cities not on your [ICON_Capital] Capital's continent with an established [ICON_Governor] Governor gain +15% [ICON_Production] Production, +15% [ICON_Faith] Faith, and +15% [ICON_Gold] Gold. Must be built adjacent to Government Plaza.
+1 [ICON_Production] Production on Rainforest in your empire. Extra +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture on Rainforest for this city. Must be built on Rainforest.
+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +2 Loyalty per turn, and +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities to each City Center within 6 tiles. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Entertainment Complex with Arena building.

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. Cities with both Market and Lighthouse building gain +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. Grants 1 Trader. Must be built on Coast adjacent to land and Harbor district.

Religious [ICON_Tourism] Tourism effects are not diminished by other civilizations with The Enlightenment Civic. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from Seaside Resorts in your empire. Must be built on Hills.
All tiles in your empire gain +2 Appeal. Must be built on flat land adjacent to City Center.
+2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in all cities. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Entertainment Complex district with Stadium building.

+1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on Marsh in your empire. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on Floodplains for this city. Must be built on Floodplains or Marsh.
+1 Wildcard policy slot. Must be built on flat land adjacent to City Center.

This wonder acts as Modern Road that bridges adjacent land tiles. All tiles in this city gain +4 Appeal. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from improvements and National Parks in this city. Must be built on Coast where two land tiles on the opposite sides can be legally connected.

Prevents damage from flooding of this river (though yields from flooding drop by 50%). Floodplains in this city gain +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for each time flood damage is mitigated. Must be built on Floodplains.

Triggers the Eureka moments for all technologies from the Ancient and Classical era. Triggers the Eureka moment for 1 random technology after another civilization recruits a [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Campus district with Library building.

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all naval and embarked units. +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admirals. Must be built on Coast adjacent to land and Harbor district.

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city provide +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every Bonus resource this city owns within 3 tiles. Must be built adjacent to [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] Cattle and Commercial Hub district with Market building.
Missionaries and Apostles can spread Religion 1 extra time. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Holy Site district, and you must have founded a Religion.
City growth rate is 15% higher in all cities. Must be built adjacent to River.
+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from each [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Works of Art in your empire. Must be built adjacent to River.

+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity for each Lake within 1 tile of this wonder. +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production on Lake in your empire. Extra +1 [ICON_Food] Food on Lake for this city. Must be built on Lake adjacent to land.
Awards 6 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron per turn. +2 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith to each City Center within 6 tiles. Must be built on Desert Hills.

+3 [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys when completed. When you are the Suzerain of a City-State, this city receives +15% bonus of its yield type. If you are the Suzerain of 2 or more City-States of same yield type, all cities receive extra +15% bonus. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Coast.
+20% [ICON_Faith] Faith in this city, and grants 4 Warrior Monks. Must be built adjacent to Holy Site district with Temple building.
Mountains provide standard adjacency bonus to Commercial Hub, Theater Square, and Industrial Zone districts. Must be built on Mountain without Volcano.
+2 Diplomatic Victory Points, and grants 2 Apostles. Must be built on Woods adjacent to Holy Site district with Temple building, and you must have founded a Religion.

[ICON_GREATENGINEER] Great Engineers have 1 extra charge. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith on Coast in your empire. Extra +1 [ICON_Science] Science and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture on Coast for this city. Must be built adjacent to Harbor district.

Grants 2 Gurus. Gurus are 30% cheaper to purchase. Religious units adjacent to Gurus gain +5 [ICON_Religion] Religious Strength in Theological Combat and +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Must be built adjacent to Holy Site and you must have founded a Religion.

All Apostles gain Martyr promotion in addition to a second promotion you choose normally. Occupying unit receives +4 [ICON_Strength] Defense Strength and 2 turns of fortification. Must be built on Floodplains or Marsh.
Patronage of Great People costs 25% less [ICON_Faith] Faith. Districts in this city provide +2 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points of their type. Must be built on Hills.
+100% [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per turn from being the Suzerain of a City-State. Must be built adjacent to River.
+20% [ICON_Science] Science in this city, and awards 2 random technologies when completed. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Campus district with University building.

This wonder acts as Canal district, and 1 or 2 adjacent Canal districts are also constructed. Must be built on flat land where this wonder and the adjacent Canal districts can legally connect two bodies of water or a body of water to City Center.

+1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production on Desert without Floodplains in your empire. Extra +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold on Desert without Floodplains for this city. Must be built on Desert without Hills.
+1 Diplomatic policy slot. +1 Diplomatic Victory point. Must be built on Hills adjacent to Mountain.
Grants 1 Builder. All Builders can build 1 extra time. Must be built on Desert without Hills.

+20% [ICON_Production] Production in this city, and +1 [ICON_Production] Production on Mines and Quarries for this city. Must be built adjacent to River and Industrial Zone district with Factory building.

+100% [ICON_Tourism] Religious Tourism from this city. +1 [ICON_Food] Food on Tundra in your empire. Extra +1 [ICON_Production] Production and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture on Tundra for this city. Must be built adjacent to City Center.
+3 Diplomatic Victory Points. When in Golden Age, each of your [ICON_Citizen] Citizens exerts extra 0.5 Loyalty pressure in their city. Must be built on Coast adjacent to land and Harbor district.

Grants 3 Archers, 3 Spearmen, and 1 Battering Ram. +30% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards anti-cavalry units. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Encampment district with Barracks or Stable building.
Grants 1 free [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet. Must be built on flat land adjacent to [ICON_RESOURCE_STONE] Stone.
Must be built on Coast adjacent to Theater Square district.
+1 Era Score from Historic Moment if that Moment is usually worth 2 or more Era Score. Must be built adjacent to River.
Each Camp, Pasture, and Plantation within 4 tiles provides +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity. Must be built adjacent to Camp.

All current units gain a promotion level when completed. All Archaeologists can enter foreign territory without Open Borders. Must be built on flat land adjacent to Encampment district with Barracks or Stable building.

+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold on Breathtaking tiles in your empire. All founded cities not on your [ICON_Capital] Capital's continent receive a City Center building with the lowest cost when completed. Must be built on Coast adjacent to land and Harbor district.

Foreign [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to this city provide +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for them. +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for every [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to this city. Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to this city provide extra +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith to this city. Must be built on Desert adjacent to Campus district.
Receive a second naval unit each time you train a naval unit. Must be built on Coast adjacent to Industrial Zone district.
